code: import React,{useRef}from"react";import classes from"./AddTwitter.module.css";import SectionBottom from"../Layout/SectionBottom";import{addAccount}from"../../store/accounts-actions";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AddTwitter=function AddTwitter(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var inputEl=useRef();var reset=function reset(){inputEl.current.value="";inputEl.current.blur();};var formSubmitHandler=function formSubmitHandler(event){event.preventDefault();var inputValue=inputEl.current.value;var inputHandle=inputValue.split(" ").join("");if(inputHandle.trim().length>=3&&inputHandle.includes("@")){dispatch(addAccount(inputHandle));}reset();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SectionBottom,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:formSubmitHandler,className:classes.add__followings,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"@twitterhandle",ref:inputEl}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:classes.btn__add,children:"Add"})]})});};export default AddTwitter;
